results.name: Chilias, the Oracle
results.text: When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your hand instead.
results.flavor: The shining towers in the sky exist to protect the oracles.

results.name: Dia Nork, Moonlight Guardian
results.text:
Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
This creature can't attack players.
results.flavor: Flying is the greatest taboo of any race that has encountered the Guardians.

results.name: Emerald Grass
results.text:
Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
This creature can't attack players.

results.name: Frei, Vizier of Air
results.text: At the end of each of your turns, you may untap this creature.
results.flavor: "Vizier of Air, arise. Your fingers are sacred swords." —Hanusa, Radiance Elemental

results.name: Gran Gure, Space Guardian
results.text:
Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
This creature can't attack players.
results.flavor: Those who defile the Sky Castle are doomed, for they shall know the wrath of the Guardians.

results.name: Holy Awe
results.text:
Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)
Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone.

results.name: Iere, Vizier of Bullets
results.flavor: "Vizier of Bullets, arise. Your will is an arrow that never misses the target." —Hanusa, Radiance Elemental

results.name: Iocant, the Oracle
results.text:
Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
While you have at least 1 Angel Command in the battle zone, this creature gets +2000 power.
This creature can't attack players.

results.name: La Ura Giga, Sky Guardian
results.text:
Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
This creature can't attack players.
results.flavor: To protect their floating cities, Guardians are gifted with shining wings.

results.name: Lah, Purification Enforcer
results.text: No text in this card
results.flavor: Those who have seen this Enforcer believe that eclipses are omens of disaster.

results.name: Laser Wing
results.text: Choose up to 2 of your creatures in the battle zone. They can't be blocked this turn.
results.flavor: This is light speed.

results.name: Lok, Vizier of Hunting
results.text: No text in this card
results.flavor: "Vizier of Hunting, arise. Your words are arrows of light." —Hanusa, Radiance Elemental

results.name: Miele, Vizier of Lightning
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose 1 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.
results.flavor: "Vizier of Lightning, arise. Your eyes are a bow of judgment." —Hanusa, Radiance Elemental

results.name: Moonlight Flash
results.text: Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them.
results.flavor: Cower before the purity of the Angel Commands!

results.name: Rayla, Truth Enforcer
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a spell from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
results.flavor: The Enforcers deliver the oracles' words, which bear the power of truth.

results.name: Reusol, the Oracle
results.text: No text in this card
results.flavor: Soul and light enmeshed in a web of glory.

results.name: Ruby Grass
results.text:
Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
This creature can't attack players.
At the end of each of your turns, you may untap this creature.

results.name: Senatine Jade Tree
results.text:
Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
This creature can't attack players.
results.flavor: Floating trees in the sky generate beautiful light from poisoned air.

results.name: Solar Ray
results.text:
Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)
Choose 1 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

results.name: Sonic Wing
results.text: Choose 1 of your creatures in the battle zone. It can't be blocked this turn.
results.flavor: "Can't catch me!"

results.name: Szubs Kin, Twilight Guardian
results.text:
Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
This creature can't attack players.
results.flavor: Those who dwell in the sky towers eradicate all intruders.

results.name: Toel, Vizier of Hope
results.text: At the end of each of your turns, you may untap all your creatures in the battle zone.
results.flavor: "Vizier of Hope, arise. Your singing voice is a breeze of dawn." —Hanusa, Radiance Elemental

results.name: Aqua Hulcus
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.
results.flavor: Liquid People freely control liquid. For them, water is armor and shield.

results.name: Aqua Knight
results.text: When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.
results.flavor: Like a whirlpool, it never seems to end.

results.name: Aqua Soldier
results.text: When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.
results.flavor: "What a spirit for such a skinny little thing." —Brawler Zyler

results.name: Aqua Vehicle
results.text: No text in this card
results.flavor: The chip implanted in its head lets the Cyber Lords control its brain waves.

results.name: Brain Serum
results.text:
Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)
Draw up to 2 cards.

results.name: Candy Drop
results.text: This creature can't be blocked.
results.flavor: No mouth. Big bite.

results.name: Crystal Memory
results.text:
Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)
Search your deck. You may take a card from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

results.name: Faerie Child
results.text: This creature can't be blocked.
results.flavor: A school of teeny, tiny points of light. Stopping them all is impossible.

results.name: Hunter Fish
results.text:
Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
This creature can't attack.
results.flavor: It lies in wait, hidden in coral reefs, lashing out ferociously when it senses prey.

results.name: Illusionary Merfolk
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have a Cyber Lord in the battle zone, draw up to 3 cards.
results.flavor: The Cyber Lords' devotion to beauty is so extreme, they even designed their warrior race to have a pleasant appearance.

results.name: King Coral
results.text: Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
results.flavor: Leviathans mature slowly, eventually growing to become the largest creatures in the world.

results.name: King Ripped-Hide
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw up to 2 cards.
results.flavor: Long ago, the Cyber Lords built a city on his back.

results.name: Marine Flower
results.text:
Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
This creature can't attack.
results.flavor: It blooms in the ocean depths, far from any light.

results.name: Phantom Fish
results.text:
Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
This creature can't attack.

results.name: Revolver Fish
results.text:
Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
This creature can't attack.

results.name: Saucer-Head Shark
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, return each creature in the battle zone that has power 2000 or less to its owner's hand.
results.flavor: "Isn't it cool? The heads can be combined." —Tropico

results.name: Seamine
results.text: Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
results.flavor: If the last thing in your life you want to see is something beautiful, attack an underwater city.

results.name: Spiral Gate
results.text:
Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)
Choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

results.name: Teleportation
results.text: Choose up to 2 creatures in the battle zone and return them to their owners' hands.
results.flavor: "Start all over from your previous life!" —Crystal Lancer

results.name: Tropico
results.text: This creature can't be blocked while you have at least 2 other creatures in the battle zone.
results.flavor: "I will lead you into battle."

results.name: Unicorn Fish
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose 1 creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.
results.flavor: It attacks anything that enters its territory, even Leviathans.

results.name: Virtual Tripwire
results.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.
results.flavor: It will stay until it dies.

results.name: Black Feather, Shadow of Rage
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy 1 of your creatures.

results.name: Bloody Squito
results.text:
Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
This creature can't attack.
When this creature wins a battle, destroy it.

results.name: Bone Assassin, the Ripper
results.text: Slayer (When this creature loses a battle, destroy the other creature.)
results.flavor: Commanders send them to the front line. It's too dangerous to have them close.

results.name: Bone Spider
results.text: When this creature wins a battle, destroy it.
results.flavor: They can wait forever, for they know they will not die alone.

results.name: Creeping Plague
results.text: Whenever any of your creatures becomes blocked this turn, it gets "slayer" until the end of the turn. (When a creature that has "slayer" loses a battle, destroy the other creature.)
results.flavor: Witness the power of the Dark!

results.name: Dark Clown
results.text:
Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
This creature can't attack.
When this creature wins a battle, destroy it.

results.name: Dark Raven, Shadow of Grief
results.text: Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
results.flavor: If you've ever thought there was something hiding in the dark, you were right.

results.name: Dark Reversal
results.text:
Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)
Return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

results.name: Death Smoke
results.text: Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures.
results.flavor: Savor the taste of fear!

results.name: Ghost Touch
results.text:
Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)
Your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.

results.name: Gigaberos
results.text:
When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy 2 of your other creatures or destroy this creature.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

results.name: Gigagiele
results.text: Slayer (When this creature loses a battle, destroy the other creature.)
results.flavor: By assembling parts of different magical beasts, the Dark Lords created a nightmare.

results.name: Gigargon
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, return up to 2 creatures from your graveyard to your hand.
results.flavor: There is no rest in the Dark Realm, even after death.

results.name: Masked Horror, Shadow of Scorn
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.
results.flavor: Seeking to live forever, they left their bodies behind.

results.name: Night Master, Shadow of Decay
results.text: Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
results.flavor: Don't turn around. You wouldn't want to see what's behind you.

results.name: Skeleton Soldier, the Defiled
results.text: No text in this card
results.flavor: "Rip. Tear. Gnash. They all make the same delightful noises."

results.name: Stinger Worm
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy 1 of your creatures.
results.flavor: When worms kill a creature, they can still make it move.

results.name: Swamp Worm
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses 1 of his creatures and destroys it.
results.flavor: Flesh is its food. Bones are its toothpicks.

results.name: Terror Pit
results.text:
Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)
Destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures.

results.name: Vampire Silphy
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures that have power 3000 or less.
results.flavor: Dark Lords have no mercy for the weak.

results.name: Wandering Braineater
results.text:
Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
This creature can't attack.
results.flavor: Devouring nice, fresh brains is all they know . . . and all they care about.

results.name: Writhing Bone Ghoul
results.text: No text in this card
results.flavor: Seeking power, they gave up their intelligence. What they found was pain.

results.name: Armored Walker Urherion
results.text: While you have at least 1 Human in the battle zone, this creature gets +2000 power during its attacks.
results.flavor: "The world at peace? I'd rather see the world in pieces."

results.name: Artisan Picora
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put 1 card from your mana zone into your graveyard.
results.flavor: "Fix it? That's easy. Just hit it." —Legendary Artisan Picora

results.name: Bolshack Dragon
results.text:
While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
results.flavor: The last city that offended it is now a ruin.

results.name: Brawler Zyler
results.text: Power attacker +2000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.)
results.flavor: "I wouldn't, if I were you. You don't want to get hurt."

results.name: Burning Power
results.text: One of your creatures gets "power attacker +2000" until the end of the turn. (While attacking, a creature that has "power attacker +2000" gets +2000 power.)
results.flavor: Witness the power of whirling fire!

results.name: Chaos Strike
results.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's untapped creatures in the battle zone. Your creatures can attack it this turn as though it were tapped.
results.flavor: "You won't escape me!"

results.name: Crimson Hammer
results.text: Destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.
results.flavor: There's nothing a Machine Eater enjoys more than a good game of Whack-a-Hulcus.

results.name: Deadly Fighter Braid Claw
results.text: This creature attacks each turn if able.
results.flavor: A Dragonoid's true home is the battlefield.

results.name: Draglide
results.text: This creature attacks each turn if able.
results.flavor: Draglides grow with their mounts. Their bond is their weapon.

results.name: Explosive Fighter Ucarn
results.text:
When you put this creature into the battle zone, put 2 cards from your mana zone into your graveyard.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
results.flavor: Dragonoid fighters never retreat. They believe that a heroic fighter will become a Dragon in his next life.

results.name: Fatal Attacker Horvath
results.text: While you have at least 1 Armorloid in the battle zone, this creature gets +2000 power during its attacks.
results.flavor: "Any final words?"

results.name: Fire Sweeper Burning Hellion
results.text: Power attacker +2000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.)
results.flavor: Those who leave battle last are the ones who savor victory the longest.

results.name: Gatling Skyterror
results.text:
This creature can attack untapped creatures.
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
results.flavor: Part chopper, part chomper.

results.name: Immortal Baron, Vorg
results.text: No text in this card
results.flavor: "You see? The one who wins is the one who has the bigger weapon."

results.name: Magma Gazer
results.text: One of your creatures gets "power attacker +4000" and "double breaker" until the end of the turn. (A creature that has "power attacker +4000" and "double breaker" gets +4000 power while attacking and breaks 2 shields.)

results.name: Meteosaur
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.

results.name: Nomad Hero Gigio
results.text: This creature can attack untapped creatures.
results.flavor: "Time to move on. So many unexplored worlds; so much trash to find!" —Nomad Hero Gigio

results.name: Onslaughter Triceps
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put 1 card from your mana zone into your graveyard.
results.flavor: The first to the front lines are the first to taste victory.

results.name: Rothus, the Traveler
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy 1 of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses 1 of his creatures and destroys it.
results.flavor: "Though battered and scarred, I march on through wars, storms, and strife. I march on."

results.name: Stonesaur
results.text: Power attacker +2000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.)
results.flavor: There is no sanctuary in the Fire Territory. Especially on the featureless, rocky plains.

results.name: Super Explosive Volcanodon
results.text: Power attacker +4000 (While attacking, this creature gets +4000 power.)
results.flavor: After it attacks, the lucky are left with rubble.

results.name: Tornado Flame
results.text:
Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)
Destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less.

results.name: Aura Blast
results.text: Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets "power attacker +2000" until the end of the turn. (While attacking, a creature that has "power attacker +2000" gets +2000 power.)
results.flavor: Hear the roar of the mighty Earth!

results.name: Bronze-Arm Tribe
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.
results.flavor: They're bringing some friends to the party.

results.name: Burning Mane
results.text: No text in this card
results.flavor: It pulled a young tree up by the roots, swinging it over its head as though it were a twig.

results.name: Coiling Vines
results.text: When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your mana zone instead.
results.flavor: They eat vegetarians.

results.name: Dimension Gate
results.text:
Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)
Search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

results.name: Dome Shell
results.text: Power attacker +2000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.)
results.flavor: Colony Beetles feed on the World Tree to build gigantic nests on their backs.

results.name: Fear Fang
results.text: No text in this card
results.flavor: The Beast Folk are gifted with huge muscles to withstand the tremendous gravity of the World Tree.

results.name: Forest Hornet
results.text: No text in this card
results.flavor: With its deadly sting and crushing jaws, it makes the Horned Beasts cower.

results.name: Golden Wing Striker
results.text: Power attacker +2000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.)
results.flavor: Hawk warriors hunt faster than the wind.

results.name: Mighty Shouter
results.text: When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your mana zone instead.
results.flavor: "I am not pink!"

results.name: Natural Snare
results.text:
Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)
Choose 1 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into his mana zone.

results.name: Pangaea's Song
results.text: Put 1 of your creatures from the battle zone into your mana zone.
results.flavor: "Here's something better for you to do." —Fighter Dual Fang

results.name: Poisonous Dahlia
results.text: This creature can't attack players.
results.flavor: "I will never give you up." —Symbolic meaning of the poisonous dahlia in flower language

results.name: Poisonous Mushroom
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put 1 card from your hand into your mana zone.
results.flavor: You won't find these mushrooms on salads.

results.name: Red-Eye Scorpion
results.text: When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your mana zone instead.
results.flavor: Never start a fire in the depths of a forest. Enraged red-eye scorpions will come after you.

results.name: Stampeding Longhorn
results.text: This creature can't be blocked by any creature that has power 3000 or less.
results.flavor: A stampeding longhorn leaves nothing but dust in its wake.

results.name: Steel Smasher
results.text: This creature can't attack players.
results.flavor: "Me big. Me tough. Me smash." —Iron Hammer, Boar Warrior

results.name: Storm Shell
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses 1 of his creatures in the battle zone and puts it into his mana zone.
results.flavor: A Colony Beetle's spawning is a virtual nightmare. It covers the earth with a hail of its bullet-like eggs.

results.name: Thorny Mandra
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put 1 creature from your graveyard into your mana zone.
results.flavor: A beautiful flower, an alluring scent...and deadly thorns.

results.name: Tower Shell
results.text: This creature can't be blocked by any creature that has power 4000 or less.
results.flavor: Not many things want to get in its way.

results.name: Tri-horn Shepherd
results.flavor: Sometimes weeks pass before it realizes it has a gored enemy stuck to its horns.

results.name: Ultimate Force
results.text: Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone.
results.flavor: "Great Earth, give me your might!" —Fighter Dual Fang

results.name: Hanusa, Radiance Elemental
results.text: Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
results.flavor: The sky was scorched by Dragons' fire, and the earth gouged by elementals' rays. The battle raged for seven nights and seven days.

results.name: Urth, Purifying Elemental
results.text:
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
At the end of each of your turns, you may untap this creature.
results.flavor: It is said the destruction of the Ancient Empire was caused by the descent of the elementals.

results.name: Aqua Sniper
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose up to 2 creatures in the battle zone and return them to their owners' hands.
results.flavor: Water surrounds, enfolds, buoys...and attacks.

results.name: King Depthcon
results.text:
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
This creature can't be blocked.
results.flavor: Leviathans are just like storms. All you can do is wait until they pass.

results.name: Deathliger, Lion of Chaos
results.text: Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
results.flavor: The world is deafened by the roar of the deathliger.

results.name: Zagaan, Knight of Darkness
results.text: Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
results.flavor: "If I were to send him to the field, he would overwhelm the enemy in an instant. Where is the fun in that?" —Ballom, Master of Death

results.name: Astrocomet Dragon
results.text:
Power attacker +4000 (While attacking, this creature gets +4000 power.)
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
results.flavor: Even the smallest weapon attached to it has enough firepower to lay waste to an entire nation.

results.name: Scarlet Skyterror
results.text: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures that have "blocker."
results.flavor: The forces of Fire will never relent.

results.name: Deathblade Beetle
results.text:
Power attacker +4000 (While attacking, this creature gets +4000 power.)
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
results.flavor: It devours all.

results.name: Roaring Great-Horn
results.text:
Power attacker +2000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.)
Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
results.flavor: With a mighty, earthshaking roar, the King of Beasts arose.
